vendor_name: Royal St Georges Hotel Interlaken - MGallery Collection
title: Swiss Alps Interlaken Lakeside Luxury with Bernese Views, Spa & Restaurant
description:
Step into a world of Swiss elegance and Alpine charm at this majestic hotel, perfectly positioned in the heart of Interlaken. With panoramic views of the surrounding Bernese Alps, this is the perfect base for exploring the region's natural beauty, including the nearby Harder Kulm and Jungfrau mountains.

Dine on exquisite local cuisine at the hotel's Brasserie St. Georges, or venture out to sample the diverse gastronomy of Interlaken, from traditional Swiss fondue to contemporary global dishes. For those seeking a more active escape, the region offers a wealth of outdoor pursuits, from hiking and mountain biking to paragliding and water sports on Lake Thun and Lake Brienz.
location_description: Hôtel Royal St Georges Interlaken Mgallery
